ComicInfo.Summary:
DAY SIX: Society is at near collapse; people have abandoned their posts, borders are crumbling, prisons are being emptied, and it's becoming very clear even if humanity survives we'll never be the same after. While everyone races to New Orleans to halt the destruction, a new hero arises from the ashes of the first attack and plays a key role in aiding the remaining heroes.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Stjepan Šejić | 1 | Var | Virgin Variant Cover | Stjepan Šejić | 2 | Note: The digital edition (3/18/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
